exits.Shadow Temple Beginning: can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or can_hover

locations.Shadow Temple Map Chest: can_jumpslash or can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or (can_use(Dins_Fire) and has_projectile(child))

exits.Shadow Temple Boss Door:
glitch_bk_skip_shadow and is_adult and
                ((can_hover and glitch_actor and can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_live_dmg(2.0) and glitch_insane) or
                (can_bomb_slide and can_use(Hover_Boots)))

locations.Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest:
is_adult or can_hover or
                ('Invisible Spike Redeads' and glitch_shared_flags)

locations.Shadow Temple GS Falling Spikes Room: can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or (is_adult and can_mega) or can_hover

locations.Shadow Temple Wind Hint Chest: can_jumpslash or can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer)

locations.Shadow Temple GS Near Ship:
can_use(Longshot) or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_bomb_slide) or can_hover or 
                (glitch_shadow_boat_gs and is_adult and can_shield and (can_groundjump or Hookshot or can_use(Boomerang)))

exits.Shadow Temple Beyond Boat:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and
                (is_adult or can_hover or (glitch_shadow_boat and can_shield and can_damage_boost))

locations.Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest:
can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and can_weirdshot) or (can_qpa and can_isg)
locations.Shadow Temple Boss Key Chest:
can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and can_weirdshot) or (can_qpa and can_isg)

exits.Shadow Temple Boss Door:
(has_bombchus or can_use(Distant_Scarecrow) or Bow or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_shield and (can_bomb_slide or Megaton_Hammer) or can_hover)) and
                (Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 5) and (can_mega or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots)) and
                (Boss_Key_Shadow_Temple or (is_adult and glitch_bk_skip_shadow and (can_hover or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5)))))
